channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole opposite Post Office (has returned), 16th March
item.description:
The pothole opposite Hatherley Post office that was fixed previously, has returned again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 257 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gravel & other debris in road, 16th March
item.description:
A large amount of gravel & other debris on both sides of the road near the pedestrian crossing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Little Lypiatt Lypiatt Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large section of potholes on Leckhampton Road, 16th March
item.description:
Large section of pot holes that is becoming larger and dangerous to cars and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Leckhampton Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just before j11a southbound middle lane, 16th March
item.description:
Large square trench…been there for weeks, getting bigger and deeper, very uneven and dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 pothole side by side, 16th March
item.description:
This appears to be a pothole that was fixed but now 2 potholes have appeared side by side. They could cause damage to cars as you can't avoid them if traffic is coming from the other direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tredington Park, Tredington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in road opposite 23 St Paul’s Road Cheltenham, 16th March
item.description:
There is a deep and growing pothole in the road outside 23 St Paul’s Road. It has been reported before and NFA-ed but has since grown

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter dumped, 16th March
item.description:
Sadly a big bag of litter inc. MacDonald's wrappers has been dumped here. Please could it be cleaned up - thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole, 16th March
item.description:
Big chunk of tarmac missing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): High Cross Farm High Cross, Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is in bits, 16th March
item.description:
The road is verging on impassable here now thanks to the poor surface. I had to wait for several cars to pass last night because I simply could not drive over this. Please, please sort this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass in Humpty Dumps playground, 16th March
item.description:
Lots of broken bottle glass right underneath the monkey bars in the playground

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coverack Old Reddings Road, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement subsidence causing trip hazard, 16th March
item.description:
The tarmac pavement has subsided causing a trip hazard outside the church on Pilley Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15a Pilley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 15th March
item.description:
The left filter lane to Longlevens after rainfall creates a significant puddle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Elmbridge

item.title: Pothole at edge of speed bump, 15th March
item.description:
Deep - danger to vehicles and cyclists
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 118 Station Road, Woodmancote

item.title: Litter on motorway slip road, 15th March
item.description:
Unbelievable levels of litter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of rubbish/fridge freezer, 15th March
item.description:
Walking along Brockhampton Lane this morning 15/3, there are lots of black rubbish bags in the stream and other rubbish left adjacent. When walking back along the lane after lunch a fridge freezer has now been dumped along with spilt foods
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tressellion Brockhampton Lane, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular flytipper, 15th March
item.description:
Someone is routinely dumping items by this lamp post, mostly things that could go to charity shops.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 593 Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on Brooklyn Road outside the community centre, 15th March
item.description:
The pothole opposite number 11 Brooklyn Road it’s about 8 cm deep. Can somebody fill it in please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Put all about 10 cm deep on Brooklyn Road at the approach to Tennyson Road roundabou, 15th March
item.description:
Can somebody come and fill it in please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incredibly large/deep pothole, 15th March
item.description:
Very large & deep pothole to left side of road if going up incline. Right next to school. Needs fixing asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 58b Church Street, Charlton Kings

item.title: Potholes next to a school, 15th March
item.description:
Numerous potholes right next to a school. Hard to avoid.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 35 East End Road, Charlton Kings
